Package org.lazywizard.lazylib

Class EllipseUtils

Object
EllipseUtils
public class EllipseUtils extends Object
Contains methods for dealing with ellipses. Since these methods are only used in very specific cases, they have been moved into their own class to reduce clutter in the main library classes.
Since:
1.9
Author:
LazyWizard

  • Method Details

    • getPointOnEllipse

      public static Vector2f getPointOnEllipse(@Nullable Vector2f ellipseCenter, float ellipseWidth, float ellipseHeight, float ellipseAngleOffset, float angle)
      Returns a point along the circumference of an ellipse at the given angle and facing.
      Parameters:
      ellipseCenter - The center point of the ellipse (can be null for a 0, 0 origin).
      ellipseWidth - The width (size on unrotated x-axis) of the ellipse.
      ellipseHeight - The height (size on unrotated y-axis) of the ellipse.
      ellipseAngleOffset - How much to rotate the ellipse from its original axis, in degrees.
      angle - The angle, in degrees, to get the point at.
      Returns:
      A Vector2f at [@code angle} degrees along the circumference of the given ellipse.
      Since:
      1.9

    • getRandomPointOnEllipse

      public static Vector2f getRandomPointOnEllipse(@Nullable Vector2f ellipseCenter, float ellipseWidth, float ellipseHeight, float ellipseAngleOffset)
      Returns a random point along the circumference of an ellipse.
      Parameters:
      ellipseCenter - The center point of the ellipse (can be null for a 0, 0 origin).
      ellipseWidth - The width (size on unrotated x-axis) of the ellipse.
      ellipseHeight - The height (size on unrotated y-axis) of the ellipse.
      ellipseAngleOffset - How much to rotate the ellipse from its original axis, in degrees.
      Returns:
      A random point along the circumference of the given ellipse.
      Since:
      1.9
      See Also:
      • getPointOnEllipse(Vector2f, float, float, float, float)

    • getRandomPointInEllipse

      public static Vector2f getRandomPointInEllipse(@Nullable Vector2f ellipseCenter, float ellipseWidth, float ellipseHeight, float ellipseAngleOffset)
      Returns a random point inside of an ellipse with uniform distribution.
      Parameters:
      ellipseCenter - The center point of the ellipse (can be null for a 0, 0 origin).
      ellipseWidth - The width (size on unrotated x-axis) of the ellipse.
      ellipseHeight - The height (size on unrotated y-axis) of the ellipse.
      ellipseAngleOffset - How much to rotate the ellipse from its original axis, in degrees.
      Returns:
      A random point inside of the given ellipse.
      Since:
      2.0

    • isPointWithinEllipse

      public static boolean isPointWithinEllipse(Vector2f point, @Nullable Vector2f ellipseCenter, float ellipseWidth, float ellipseHeight, float ellipseAngleOffset)
      Checks whether a point is on or within the bounds of an ellipse.
      Parameters:
      point - The Vector2f to check.
      ellipseCenter - The center point of the ellipse (can be null for a 0, 0 origin).
      ellipseWidth - The width (size on unrotated x-axis) of the ellipse.
      ellipseHeight - The height (size on unrotated y-axis) of the ellipse.
      ellipseAngleOffset - How much to rotate the ellipse from its original axis, in degrees.
      Returns:
      true if point is on or within the ellipse, false otherwise.
      Since:
      1.9
